title: macro export shadowing/duplicate

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: regression-from-stable-to-beta
labels.description: Performance or correctness regression from stable to beta.

body:

<details>

 * lsio-0.1.18: [start](https://crater-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/beta-1.41-1/1.40.0/reg/lsio-0.1.18/log.txt) v. [end](https://crater-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/beta-1.41-1/beta-2019-12-18/reg/lsio-0.1.18/log.txt)

cc @petrochenkov 

cc https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/49084 (though not directly relevant)

I suspect this is a semi-intentional change.

These crates also fail, but with shadowing of built-ins; I suspect this is the same bug:

* root: conniecs-0.2.0: [start](https://crater-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/beta-1.41-1/1.40.0/reg/conniecs-0.2.0/log.txt) v. [end](https://crater-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/beta-1.41-1/beta-2019-12-18/reg/conniecs-0.2.0/log.txt)
